## SessionManager.disconnect() method

Disconnect.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
disconnect(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

If not stopped, stops the UserAgent disconnecting the WebSocket Transport.
